data.persona: I am only the blacksmith's assistant, but everyone has pressured me to go on this wolf hunt. This has me very worried - people say I'm strong but I've never killed anything before. I don't know that I won't run away when the wolves charge us.
data.description:
You are in the Prayer bell.
This is a semi-outdoors location with low stone walls, a great view of the surrounding town, creaky worn out floor, and a very large brass bell.  There is a long rope hanging down the center that one can grab and proceed to ring the bell to call people to service.
The groom is here.

You are carrying a Family Photo, and wearing a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I need to get away from the event and find and kill a rat.
data.mid_motivation: I want to kill an animal in order to prepare for the wolf hunt.
data.long_motivation: I would like to participate in the wolf hunt without embarrassing myself.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: put family photo in the gift table

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go to an alley away from the pary

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: put dead rat on the ground.
